QuestData.Title: Portals of the Legion
QuestData.Description: Here it is - the Hand of Iruxos.$b$bGot it from one of the Burning Blade leaders myself.$B$BYou must possess it if the demon portals at Mannoroc Coven are to be banished... which is what I now ask you to do.$b$bWith the demon threat increasing we must close these portals to stem the tide of demons to this world.
QuestData.LogDescription: Banish 6 Portals at Mannoroc Coven and return to Felgur Twocuts at Ghost Walker Post.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you banished the demon portals at Mannoroc Coven?
QuestData.RewardText: Your efforts have helped to slow down the enemy, $c.$b$bThank you.
